ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.2_0: At that time the nun Thullanandā did not relinquish the monastery robe, but continued using it.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.3_0: if there are no other menstruating nuns;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.4_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.5_0: “How can Venerable Thullanandā not relinquish the monastery robe, but continue using it?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.6_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.9_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā not do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.10_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.11_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.12.1_0: ‘If a nun does not relinquish a monastery robe, but continues to use it, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.1.6_0: it is given specifically for the use of menstruating nuns.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.1.7_0: Does not relinquish, but continues to use it:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.1.8_0: if she uses it for two or three days, washes it on the fourth day, and then uses it again without relinquishing it to a nun or a trainee nun or a novice nun, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.2.1_0: If it has not been relinquished, and she perceives that it has not, and she uses it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.2.2_0: If it has not been relinquished, but she is unsure of it, and she uses it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.2.3_0: If it has not been relinquished, but she perceives that it has, and she uses it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.2.4_0: If it has been relinquished, but she perceives that it has not, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.2.5_0: If it has been relinquished, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.2.6_0: If it has been relinquished, and she perceives that it has, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.2_0: if she relinquishes it and then uses it;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.3_0: if she uses it again at the next turn;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.4_0: if there are no other menstruating nuns;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.5_0: if her robe has been stolen;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.6_0: if her own robe has been lost;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.9_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.10_0: The seventh training rule is finished.
